name: rtf.js
description: Render RTF documents in HTML. This also includes rendering WMF and EMF images which are often contained in RTF documents.

scripts.bundle: rollup --config rollup.config.rtfjs.js && rollup --config rollup.config.wmfjs.js && rollup --config rollup.config.emfjs.js
scripts.build: npm run clean && npm run compile && npm run bundle
scripts.coverage: rimraf .nyc_output && cd dist && nyc instrument . . && cd .. && nyc mocha test/test-rtfjs.js && nyc report --report-dir=.nyc_output --reporter=json
scripts.coverage-html: rimraf coverage && cd dist && remap-istanbul --input ../.nyc_output/coverage-final.json --output ../coverage --type html && cd ..

author: Thomas Bluemel
